casebody.data:
Gazi TIPOU, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Lashanda MARSH, Defendant,
and
Farm Bureau General Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157520-1
COA: 334588
335368 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 27, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

BERNSTEIN , J., did not participate because he has a family member with an interest that could be affected by the proceeding.
